message.magicfungi.fate_design: You attempt to change fate's design, but nothing happens.
tooltip.magicfungi.magical_fungi_armor.1: A special armor that harness the
tooltip.magicfungi.alloy_info.3: Try not to think too much about it.
tooltip.magicfungi.morbus_clock: A special device able to predict the doomsday.
tooltip.magicfungi.heart_of_vivifica.1: An ancient artifact that can restore life.
tooltip.magicfungi.heart_of_vivifica.2: Can be used to remove Morbus spreading.
message.magicfungi.heart_of_vivifica: You feel relieved that your actions might have somehow improved the world for the better.
tooltip.magicfungi.heart_of_morbus.1: An ancient artifact that can bring curses.
tooltip.magicfungi.heart_of_morbus.2: Can be used to reactivate Morbus spreading.
message.magicfungi.heart_of_morbus: You feel guilty that your actions might have somehow doomed the world.
text.magicfungi.guide_book.landing_text: Impetus, Clypeus, Utilis and Vivifica. Long ago, an unnamed meteor collided with our planet, spreading these alien fungi into the local fauna. After centuries of research, humanity is able to harness the magical properties of the fungi for Magic.$(br2)§l- §rThaís Utilis
text.magicfungi.research_log.landing_tex: Impetus, Clypeus, Utilis and Vivifica. These are all 4 known magic mushrooms researched by the greatest minds of long gone generations. Today, I and Test Subject-D0G travel to do our own research on the magic properties of the forbidden fungi.$(br2)§l- §r§kGordon Morbus
description.magicfungi.impetus_mushroom: One of the five Magic Mushrooms, representing §caggressiveness§r and the wish to §cattack§r. Can be found on any overworld biome, but is more frequently seen on §cSavannas§r.
description.magicfungi.clypeus_mushroom: One of the five Magic Mushrooms, representing §bprotectiveness§r and the wish to §bdefend§r. Can be found on any overworld biome, but is more frequently seen on §bTundras§r.
description.magicfungi.utilis_mushroom: One of the five Magic Mushrooms, representing §dversatility§r and the wish to be §dhelpful§r. Can be found on any overworld biome, but is more frequently seen on §dMountains§r.
description.magicfungi.vivifica_mushroom: One of the five Magic Mushrooms, representing §anature§r and the wish to §aheal§r. Can be found on any overworld biome, but is more frequently seen on §aJungles§r.
description.magicfungi.morbus_mushroom: One of the five Magic Mushrooms, representing §8disease§r and the wish to §8corrupt§r. Can be found exclusively on the §8Host Biome§r.
description.magicfungi.glyph_carving_wor: A special crafting block used to carve glyphs.
description.magicfungi.spell_discovery_w: A special crafting block used to discover spells. It's not crafted by normal means, but via using an Exponentia Spell on a Crafting Table.
description.magicfungi.exponentia_glyph: A glyph used to transform a Crafting Table into a Spell Discovery Workbench.
description.magicfungi.pluviam_glyph: Clears any sort of bad weather in the world.
description.magicfungi.cadentis_glyph: Creates a small, purple flame where it's placed. TIP: You can recolor the flame by interactingw with it with the other types of Magic Mushrooms!
description.magicfungi.pudicitiam_glyph: Heals creatures into their healed counterpart (e.g: zombie villager -> villager).
description.magicfungi.sanctificare_glyp: Converts a small patch of Host Grass into regular grass.
description.magicfungi.parasitus_glyph: Parasites a creature, slowly killing it. Its lost health will be passed into you.
description.magicfungi.corrumpere_glyph: Corrupts creatures into their corrupt counterpart (e.g: Hoglin -> Zoglin).
description.magicfungi.maledictio_glyph: Converts a small patch of regular grass into Host Grass.
description.magicfungi.ignei_spell: Summons a small fire charge towards the direction the user's looking at.
description.magicfungi.scintillam_spell: Summons a fireball towards the direction user's looking at.
description.magicfungi.cadere_spell: Grants slow falling for a few seconds, useful to avoid having fractures over big falls.
description.magicfungi.glacies_spell: Grants a special ice protection to the user, at the cost of becoming slower.
description.magicfungi.tractabile_spell: Instantly opens the user's Ender Chest.
description.magicfungi.fertilis_spell: Stimulates the growth of nearby crops.
description.magicfungi.guide_book: A guide book covering all the basic content of Magic Mycology. You should receive it when first creating the world. If not, you can craft one by combining a book and any Magic Mushroom.
advancements.magicfungi.magic_fungi.desc: Start your magic studies by finding a Magic Mushroom
advancements.magicfungi.mushroom_stew.de: Cook up a special fungi stew
advancements.magicfungi.host_biome.descr: Discover the cursed lands of the Morbus
advancements.magicfungi.heart_of_vivific: Heal the world permanently with a Heart of Vivifica
Corrupt the world permanently with a Heart of Morbus
advancements.magicfungi.essences.descrip: Harness the raw power of a Magic Mushroom by extracting its essence
advancements.magicfungi.relics.descripti: Forge an old relic from many eons ago
advancements.magicfungi.fungi_armor.desc: Craft the full Magical Fungi armor set
